presentationTable.name: Base Facts
presentationTable.description: This folder contains metrics like Revenue, Billed Qty, with different types of aggregation.

presentationColumns.name: Revenue
presentationColumns.description: Returns the Revenue from the Revenue Facts table with a Sum aggregation

presentationColumns.name: Billed Quantity
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:SampleApp Lite.F0 Revenue Base Measures.Billed Quantity
presentationColumns.description: Returns the Billed Quantity from the Revenue Facts table with a Sum aggregation

presentationColumns.name: Discount Amount
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:SampleApp Lite.F0 Revenue Base Measures.Discount Amount
presentationColumns.description: Returns the Discount Amount from the Revenue Facts table with a Sum aggregation

presentationColumns.name: Target Revenue
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:SampleApp Lite.F1 Targets Base Measures.Target Revenue
presentationColumns.description: Returns the Target Revenue from the Target Facts table, with a Sum aggregation

presentationColumns.name: Target Quantity
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:SampleApp Lite.F1 Targets Base Measures.Target Quantity
presentationColumns.description: Returns the Target Quantity from the Target Facts table with a Sum aggregation
